meanings.definition: Make practical and effective use of.
meanings.sent1: She is utilising her time wisely by studying for her exams.
meanings.sent2: The company is utilising new technology to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: He tried utilising a banana as a phone, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The chef is utilising his creativity to craft a unique dish.
meanings.sent5: By utilising all available resources, she completed the project ahead of schedule.

meanings.sent1: The students are utilising the library for research purposes.
meanings.sent2: She is utilising her skills to help others in need.
meanings.sent3: He was caught utilising his sister's toys without permission.
meanings.sent4: The detective is utilising clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: By utilising his knowledge, he was able to fix the broken machine.
